pages.text: Has name $(o)Muramasa$() carved on it, The Blade was made by a smith from Muramasa family. It is named the same as the legendary Bewitched Blade, but not smithed by the same smith. Definitely, they are not the same Blade.$(br2)At that time, Muramasa family is one of the famous families of smiths, and they are even teachers of our Youkai smiths.
